item.title: Current Work
item.description: Areas of research, application and community engagement I founded the Montreal AI Ethics Institute with the vision of creating tangible and practical research in the ethical, safe and inclusive development of AI. See the link for more details - Montreal AI Ethics Institute I founded the meetup group on AI Ethics in Montreal that meets once every two weeks to do a deep dive on different aspects of the ethical development of AI.
